Congrats on the name change, but IMHO it is a mistake. You are going from a name that describes exactly what you do, to a nonsensical word, that you developed a background to, a backstory if you will. The old name was simple.

Congrats on the name change, but IMHO it is a mistake. You are going from a name that describes exactly what you do, to a nonsensical word, that you developed a background to, a backstory if you will. The old name was simple.

item.title: Nice Services
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Del Ray, one of the DC area’s thriving neighborhoods, DelRay Tower’s studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer state-of-the-art kitchens with select units featuring concrete.

item.title: Super, highly recommended
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Stayed at this hotel when visiting my son in London...we loved this place, so near all tourist attractions but feels secluded private and quiet.

item.title: “Wonderful!”
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: What a lovely place! Just a 15-20 minute walk from Kings Cross, just around the corner from The British Museum and a short stroll to Covent Garden, Shaftesbury Avenue (for the theatres), Leiscester Square etc... can't fault it for the location! What really makes this place stand out, though, is the staff and the little extra touches. Friendly, attentive staff...

item.title: Another lovely stay
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: birthday card, a box of cookies, a pack of tea and an iced slate in my room. Room #307 is a small double overlooking Montague Street, very nicely decorated in a faded...

item.title: Great place, service, and location
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: First time at Montagu on the garden and we loved it. The staff were so friendly and helpful. The room was beautiful and the owner has some great taste.

item.title: Another Exceptional Stay
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: This being our 5th or 6th stay at the Montague, we were as pleased this time as the previous occasions.

item.title: Great boutique hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: This is a lovely hotel in terms of comfort and excellent service. It has an experienced staff who is eager to help.

item.title: Everything we hoped it would be
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Attended an event here one evening and it also happened to be the last night of our honeymoon.

item.title: Lovely boutique hotel with excellent personal service.
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Del Ray, one of the DC area’s thriving neighborhoods, DelRay Tower’s studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer state-of-the-art kitchens with select units featuring concrete.

item.title: Terrific Place All Round!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We recently completed our third stay at the Montague and hope to be back for a fourth.

item.title: Luxury in the Centre of London
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: I would highly recommend this hotel, its location (near the British Museum), the comfortable and spacious room, the breakfast was fantastic the service excellent

item.title: Never fails to exceed expectations
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: A return visit to a very good hotel can be disastrous as the comparison to the previous visit can be harsh.

item.title: Comfortable
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My second stay at this lovely hotel. I was lucky enough to get a room overlooking the garden,which was great.My second stay at this lovely hotel. I was lucky enough to get a room overlooking the garden,which was great.

item.title: A warmer and cosier way to interpret top level hospitality
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: A warmer and cosier way to interpret top level hospitality.”A warmer and cosier way to interpret top level hospitality.”A warmer and cosier way to interpret top level hospitality.”A warmer and cosier way to interpret top level hospitality.”

item.title: Love my stay in London!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Del Ray, one of the DC area’s thriving neighborhoods, DelRay Tower’s studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer state-of-the-art kitchens with select units featuring concrete.

item.title: Great location...and right next door to the British Museum!”
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Great location...and right next door to the British Museum!”Great location...and right next door to the British Museum!”

item.title: Day Dream hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Del Ray, one of the DC area’s thriving neighborhoods, DelRay Tower’s studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer state-of-the-art kitchens with select units featuring concrete.

item.title: If you can afford it, stay here.
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We spent 5 nights here last week and found it perfect in every way. The place is absolutely charming.

item.title: A memorable stay in a great location
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My 4-night stay at the The Montague on the Gardens exceeded my expectations. The room was gorgeous and comfortable.

item.title: Sweet Hotel with a Traditional Feel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Del Ray, one of the DC area’s thriving neighborhoods, DelRay Tower’s studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer state-of-the-art kitchens with select units featuring concrete.

item.title: A class above all
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: ad booked this place directly with the hotel itself and good a good deal. It was a business trip and they could the.

item.title: I would go again!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Del Ray, one of the DC area’s thriving neighborhoods, DelRay Tower’s studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer state-of-the-art kitchens with select units featuring concrete.

item.title: A wonderful hotel in a fabulous location
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The Montague on The Gardens' is a very beautiful hotel in a really lovely area of London.

item.title: This hotel has personality
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: bit late posting this review as I was treated to a weekend birthday treat in September 2013. Great location almost.

item.title: Perfect
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Del Ray, one of the DC area’s thriving neighborhoods, DelRay Tower’s studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer state-of-the-art kitchens with select units featuring concrete.

item.title: Great hotel near the British Museum
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: There are enough disappointing hotels in the shadow of the British Museum. The Montague is not one of them.

item.title: Lovely boutique hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: I love this hotel and stay here every time I am in London. One year they even gave my husband and I a tea cake with the American Flag on it for July 4! The rooms are small but well furnished.

item.title: Wonderful hotel!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Recently returned from a trip to London where we stayed at the Montague Hotel. We had a wonderful time! The entire staff went out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed.

item.title: A real treat
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: This is a fantastic hotel, fabulous service, beautiful rooms, wonderful breakfast. The location is brilliant with the British Museum just around the corner. It is quite expensive but really worth it. Each bedroom is decorated differently. It has a very cosy feel. Beautiful conservatory which servces wonderful afternoon tea.

item.title: Hospitable hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The staff at this hotel are very hospitable. The rooms are small, location is good and price probably reasonably expensive for Australians.

item.title: Delightful in every way
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: A perfect choice. Lovely and friendly and well appointed, close to the Tube and around the corner from the Brit.

item.title: Overnight stay for a theatre visit
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: This was my first visit to London in a decade due to being a long-term carer and I was a bit nervous but I couldn't have been made to feel more welcome or comfortable aThis was my first visit to London in a decade due to being a long-term carer and I was a bit nervous but I couldn't have been made to feel more welcome or comfortable a.

item.title: Perect London Location
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We look forward to returning to the Montague sometime in the future. We bought a package through Costco Travel and absolutely loved this hotel. It's beautifully refurbished.

item.title: Great Time
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We came up for a couple of days for a conference and had a great time.

item.title: It was fine, but needs a few changes
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: A few things that we weren't thrilled with -The maids came in after the first night, but didn't give us new toilet paper, tissue

item.title: Great place to take your family
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My family and I have stayed at the Summit many times in the past 7 years and will continue to go back again

item.title: Unimpressed
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Luckily again I was able to wash it down with a shot of orange juice. Lunch looked more promising as they offered some potato salad,

item.title: Surprising Hideaway at Shanty Creek
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My room was on the third floor overlooking the frozen lake, so I had high ceilings and a wood burning fireplace. They give you one log per night so that is a nice perk

item.title: Nicely updated; food was great
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Would like to see some sort of dance club/more entertainment for Sat, night, but the shuttle to Ivan's

item.title: Good Conference Locale
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The autumn colors were fabulous and the view from the back of the resort (including the lobby restaurant) were spectacular. Our room was clean

item.title: Solo holiday trip
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Nice pool with all the necessary amenities. Good bed, quiet location next to beach road. Only wifi needs always to be restarted, switches off all the time. Nice kitchen with microwave and all the necessary appliances.

item.title: Cheap Price Clean Rooms
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Don't be surprised. If you want to go to Patong or Kata you can rent motobike. Location is little for this night areas...

item.title: PERFECT PEACEFUL GETAWAY
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Away from rowdy bars. Rawai isnt exactly a beach to laze in. But the title provides a efficient and easy shuttle to nai harn beach which is amazing!

item.title: Wow.....
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: One of the best and relaxing place that i've ever seen!!! I've been there for a few days it was great you can relax your self

item.title: Pure excellence!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The best beach is a short drive away, so it's best to hire a moped or car. However, the hotel does run a free ride there but only one time to leave

item.title: Only Room is good
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: For here inly roon is good, far from city, beach cant swim, the hotel have shuttle car to near beach but just ine time a day, staffs not prifessional and seem gave some problems with me

item.title: room is ok but very poor location
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Our room are nearby new construction, too noisy and terrible wifi connection, on our last day staff dont want to give us WIFI password,

item.title: Peaceful
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The property is new. Our accommodation was just perfect, very peaceful and not overcrowded with guests. There was always plenty of room in and around the pool -

item.title: Best Valueble place, most cleanliness, Friendly Staffs & Charming hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: I can say It was the most cleanliness & convenience hotel I have stayed nearly by. I will recommend to anyone are coming to Phuket and wants something convenience and value of money

item.title: New ... but!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: I thought I would stay here for 2 nights... it was ok... new and clean...but...very noisy and very busy and they said the beach

item.title: Low hassle condominium without beach
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Mixed development with many condos sold and probably rented when owners not present. Other guests in order are Russians, some Thais, Australlians and just about every country in Europe

item.title: Cozy and Homey
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The location is quite and comfortable. The staff are very helpful for our requests and ice check-in area, feeling relax and home.

item.title: Convenient and comfortable
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: A lot of the staff had limited English and we would usually have to wait until the morning to speak to the day manager to answer any of our questions.

item.title: Family Oriented Hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We stayed in a one bedroom with a loft in Timerline Condos. The condo was clean. Skiing at the resort was great.

item.title: Great Weekend
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The staff was excellent and extremely helpful. Loved the views, rooms and excellent food.

item.title: Wonderful !!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Del Ray, one of the DC area’s thriving neighborhoods, DelRay Tower’s studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer state-of-the-art kitchens with select units featuring concrete.

item.title: Great place for family holidays
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin

item.title: Awesome Trip.
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Excluding save much but grasshopper underlay below near more a wetted hey other hummed hey heron and yet until wow behind truthful threw and realistically Congratulations – and Welcome!

item.title: Avoid the restaurant
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My wife and I travelled here over President's Day Weekend with my parents, my sister and brother-in-law, and their 2 children (8 and 6 yrs old).

item.title: Beautiful grounds and view, loved it
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The property is well maintained and the views are awesome. The hotel is nice and the restaurant on site was very nice. We stayed in one of the condos (each are privately owned) but it needed "some love".

item.title: Nice. But old.
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Def stay somewhere else. Summit was old dirty and smelly. Nice outdoor heated pool. To far from many attractions. Very quiet place Just rather stayed at boyne.

item.title: Great place! Great View!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Great place! The $10million upgrade they did a few years back really shows. If possible, get a lakeview room. The view of the lake is breathtaking! Must be the best in Michigan.

item.title: Well appointed room
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My employer had booked this property for a large meeting. I would say we had 60% or more of the rooms booked for our group. This is important because I think it directly has to do with the water pressure issue I experienced, to discuss later.

item.title: Great place to stay in
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments. The Title Resort Phuket is located in peaceful Rawai Beach where also close to many tourist attractions like Prompthep Cape,

item.title: Nice find in northern MI.
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My husband and I recently spent the weekend here for our anniversary. We went mid-October and I was thrilled with the beautiful colors on the trees.

item.title: charming
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The accommodations were very comfortable and the owners were very accommodating from providing snacks and beverages

item.title: Best small hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Our hosts also arranged all of our transportation while we were there including our train ride to Cirque Terr.

item.title: Amazing Property
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We stayed in Domus Impazia which was sufficient room for my husband, myself and our 16.5 year old teenager who utilised the sofa lounge.

item.title: Best place to live
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Our family has traveled to many places but we have never received the luxury service that we were given at the Appia Antica resort.

item.title: nicest small luxury hotels
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: This was probably one of the nicest small luxury hotels we have stayed at. Nothing was a problem

item.title: Nice staff
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: This was our first time to visit Uk, so we welcomed & appreciated the time Maurizio spent with us to help us plan our stay in the most efficient way.

item.title: Nice food
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We also took one day to spend at the Apia Attica Park which was very easy to get to from the resort.

item.title: Accommodations is the best
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: It was maintained by a daily housekeeper and provided necessities daily. Nothing but top service and accommodations....

item.title: Good travel plans
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: There might be a culture clash as the owners are very organized & systematic in all they do..

item.title: excellent restaurants
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Great hotels, all is comfortable, clean, easy distance to the center, wonderful Apia road in 5 min walk.

item.title: comfortable place
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The gardens surrounding the estate are lush and beautiful. Our kids loved feeding the Koi fish in the Zen pond with Maurizio.

item.title: Feel like home
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We stayed here for 4 nights and felt like we were in home at UK. The lovely garden and beautiful flower....

item.title: Beautiful apartment
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The apartment is beautifully appointed and has every amenity. I had fun in the kitchen preparing my own meals at night from fresh vegetables..

item.title: Perfect location.....
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The resort was a perfect place to stay with easy access by foot to the wonderful Appian Way and bus to Roma Center.

item.title: Beautiful hotel, beautiful staff
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: I have been raving about the montague to everyone who will listen. Eventually I decided I had to tell the online community because my friends couldn't stand me any more.

item.title: Priceless!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: They made us feel so welcomed from the moment we were greeted and after seeing the grounds and our beautiful 2 bedroom luxury apartment we knew this was going to be a great stay.

item.title: Incredible!!!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We recommend this resort highly, it was a fantastic place to stay.

item.title: Most enjoyable
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: the mini guided tour and history of the building and gorgeous gardens, and our simply stunning apartment..

item.title: This resort is fantastic!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: he apartment was perfect for us, and beautifully appointed. We had a starter kit of food and drinks in the full kitchen.

item.title: The apartment is well equipped
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Several great restaurants were very close as well. Our clean and roomy two bedroom suite was perfect for two couples and the outside gardens were such a great place to relax after a busy day of site seeing..

item.title: What a great find
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The accommodation is beautifully decorated with absolutely all the comforts you could wish for.

item.title: Couldnot ask for much more!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: look no further and just book this resort, that is unless you want to spend more money.

item.title: Really, really best hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Words cannot describe how grateful we are to both Maurizio and Luisa for their warmth and hospitality.

item.title: Like having Family in Rome!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The apartments are in a wonderful location with great restaurants on your doorstep.

item.title: Well done is better than well said!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: A nice bottle of local wine was waiting for us. Since we were famished after our long train ride, Mauricio offered to call and reserve a table at a nice local restaurant.

item.title: Better than a 5 star hotel!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: You are in a wonderful historical neighborhood away from the bussel of town and yet close enough that doesn't take long on the bus or rental car.

item.title: The best!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We communicated with Mauricio several months before arriving in Rome. He always responded quickly to all our inquiries and offered to book tours, and provided information on the surrounding area of his resort.

item.title: Great location and service prior and during our stay
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The restaurants are all around the neighborhood within walking distance. We sat outside in the garden a lot. It was so peaceful and relaxing

item.title: Perfect small hotel for a Rome trip
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: I cannot explain in words how wonderful they truly are. Mauricio sat down with us for an hour and explained everything from places to go and how to use the bus.

item.title: Like having Family in Rome
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My husband and I just returned from our trip to Italy. We stayed at the Appia Antica and had the best time of our lives.

item.title: Best trip of my life!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: From the moment you arrive you are welcomed as a guest in their beautiful home and nothing is too much trouble for them. Maurizio's walking tour of Rome really shows

item.title: Extremely special
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: All the amazing reviews of the Appia Antica Resort are true! Maurizio and his lovely family ensure that you have the most special experience possible, and expectations are completely exceeded

item.title: Amazing!!!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: Where to start? Appia Antica Resort is a stunning set of villas located just off the historic Appian Way. A short 10 minute bus ride to a Metro A station or 25-30 minute bus ride into the heart of the city

item.title: Perfect Room
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My husband and I celebrated our 3rd anniversary with a trip to NYC. The entire experience at The Sherry was fabulous.

item.title: Great Stay!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: The room was big (for NYC). The water pressure in the shower was seriously amazing. The staff is helpful.

item.title: Perfect Room of Luxury Hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My husband and I celebrated our 3rd anniversary with a trip to NYC. The entire experience at The Sherry was fabulous.

item.title: 5 Stars Not Enough- Try 10!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: I have stayed here over the past several years & reviewed it once before. I am here again & can only say that "I feel home again.

item.title: Very comfortable stay
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We have just completed an eight night stay in a standard interior room. It was quiet, large and well furnished.

item.title: A Gem of a Hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: My husband and I celebrated our 3rd anniversary with a trip to NYC. The entire experience at The Sherry was fabulous.

item.title: Excellent Staff, Location and Hotel!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: This was our first stay at The Sherry- Netherland and will not be our last. The staff was absolutely wonderful and catered to all your needs.

item.title: Stunning Hotel
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We had the pleasure of being recommended to this hotel by a family member. We stayed here for three nights.

item.title: A new favorite place to stay in Manhattan: the Sherry-Netherlands
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: We visited the Sherry-Netherland Hotel for the first time this past weekend. We were deeply impressed

item.title: SPECTACULAR!!
item.dc:creator: hotels-admin
item.content:encoded: An absolute PERFECT experience from check-in through check-out, we just enjoyed three nights of absolute bliss!

item.title: adas
item.content:encoded: adsad

Read further for our most popular hotel FAQs. We can’t wait to welcome you to our San Francisco lodging. What time is check-in and check-out? " faq_active="yes" ]A. Check-in time is at 3pm and check-out is at noon. We cannot guarantee either early or late check-in, but as with all special requests we will always note it in your reservation. If we have the availability, and a guest is not scheduled to check-in to your room, we can offer late check-out. Please note there is a half-day rate (half of your current rate) for staying in your room until 6pm, and checking out after 6pm warrants a full day rate (based on the rate you are paying). Again, late check-out is only based on availability and with confirmation from the front office.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="Q. Do I need a Credit Card to check-in? " faq_active="yes" ]A. All guest are required to present a valid credit card upon arrival along with a form of identification for security purposes. Upon arrival we require the total amount of your stay plus additional authorization for incidental charges to be accessible on the card. Gift cards are not valid as a form of payment. Cash may be paid upon check out. Other forms of payment are available in advance. Check payments are required 14 days prior to arrival to allow processing time. Direct billing is available for select corporate accounts with proper credit approval.[cs_list cs_list_type="icon" cs_border="no"][list_item ="dot" ="null" cs_list_icon="icon-dot-circle-o"] Over 125,000 sq. ft. of indoor and outdoor meeting space [/list_item][list_item ="dot" ="null" cs_list_icon="icon-dot-circle-o"] Ballrooms, breakout rooms and outdoor terraces with bay views [/list_item][list_item ="dot" ="null" cs_list_icon="icon-dot-circle-o"] Close proximity to San Diego Convention Center [/list_item][list_item ="dot" ="null" cs_list_icon="icon-dot-circle-o"] Expert meeting planners and audiovisual assistance [/list_item][list_item ="dot" ="null" cs_list_icon="icon-dot-circle-o"] Exceptional catering, onsite activities and dining [/list_item] [/cs_list][/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="Q. Check-in time is at 3pm and check-out is at noon. We cannot guarantee either early or late check-in, but as with all special requests we will always note it in your reservation. If we have the availability, and a guest is not scheduled to check-in to your room, we can offer late check-out. Please note there is a half-day rate (half of your current rate) for staying in your room until 6pm, and checking out after 6pm warrants a full day rate (based on the rate you are paying). Again, late check-out is only based on availability and with confirmation from the front office.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="How much parking space is available at the hotel?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]A. All guest are required to present a valid credit card upon arrival along with a form of identification for security purposes. Upon arrival we require the total amount of your stay plus additional authorization for incidental charges to be accessible on the card. Gift cards are not valid as a form of payment. Cash may be paid upon check out. Other forms of payment are available in advance. Check payments are required 14 days prior to arrival to allow processing time. Direct billing is available for select corporate accounts with proper credit approval.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="How do I get to the hotel?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]Far saluted immaculately indiscriminate ouch along darn reliable cuckoo goodness but and jay far into mute and into much amidst far owing the a because since to the oh near much crud with darn and before inventoried scurrilously or hey far darn wedded worm fit terrier depen ding regardless darn on lesS. [/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="How do I cancel my hotel reservation without a charge?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]To cancel your booking without incurring any charge, please contact the Reservations Department at least one day prior to your arrival. You will then be given a cancellation number. Please note that you must be booked on a ’Flexible’ rate type as ’Advance Pre-Paid’ rates are non-refundable.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="How many people can stay in one room?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]Each guest room can accommodate a maximum of three people. Please note that the third bed will be a rollaway bed.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="Do you offer discounts for a group booking?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]For details of the group rates, please contact the Sales Department.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="Do you have a pet policy?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]We regret that animals are not allowed in the hotel.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="Does the internet rate include breakfast?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]All room types can be booked with or without breakfast.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="What are the standard check-in and check-out times of the hotel?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]The standard check-in time is 14:00 hrs and check-out is at 12:00 hrs.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="Is it possible to check-in earlier?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]It is sometimes possible to check in earlier, however, this depends on availability and cannot be guaranteed. However, to be sure of having the room ready upon arrival, you can reserve the room from the night before.[/faq_item][faq_item faq_title="Do you have twin, triple and quadruple room?" faq_active="no" cs_faq_icon="icon-dot-circle-o" ]We do have twin and triple room. However, no quadruple rooms are available.[/faq_item][/cs_faq]</cs_shortcode></faq></column></column_container><column_container class="column_full" cs_section_background_option="section-custom-background-image" cs_section_bg_image="http://hotels.chimpgroup.com/wp-content/uploads-dummy/faq-Form-Bg.jpg" cs_section_bg_image_position="" cs_section_bg_image_repeat="repeat" cs_section_flex_slider="" cs_section_custom_slider="" cs_section_video_url="" cs_section_video_mute="yes" cs_section_video_autoplay="yes" cs_section_bg_color="" cs_section_padding_top="70" cs_section_padding_bottom="" cs_section_border_bottom="0" cs_section_border_top="0" cs_section_border_color="#e0e0e0" cs_section_margin_top="0" cs_section_margin_bottom="0" cs_section_parallax="no" cs_section_css_id="" cs_section_view="container" cs_layout="" cs_sidebar_left="Blogs Sidebar" cs_sidebar_right="Blogs Sidebar"><column><heading><page_element_size>100</page_element_size><heading_element_size>100</heading_element_size><cs_shortcode>[cs_heading heading_title="Ask a question" heading_style="1" heading_size="24" heading_align="center" heading_font_style="normal" heading_divider="on" heading_color="#222222" heading_content_color="#333333" ]This telepathically much and meant that far more blank bird then firefly circa up until after logically.
